select.if: SELECT m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM, COALESCE(SUM(c.CAUTIONSCORE), 0) AS CAUCOUNT FROM SCOTT.MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CAUTION c ON m.UNO = c.UNO GROUP BY m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM ORDER BY m.UNO

if.if: SELECT m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM, COALESCE(SUM(c.CAUTIONSCORE), 0) AS CAUCOUNT FROM SCOTT.MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CAUTION c ON m.UNO = c.UNO WHERE m.NAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' GROUP BY m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM ORDER BY m.UNO

SELECT m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM, COALESCE(SUM(c.CAUTIONSCORE), 0) AS CAUCOUNT FROM SCOTT.MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CAUTION c ON m.UNO = c.UNO WHERE m.NICKNAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' GROUP BY m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM ORDER BY m.UNO

SELECT m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM, COALESCE(SUM(c.CAUTIONSCORE), 0) AS CAUCOUNT FROM SCOTT.MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CAUTION c ON m.UNO = c.UNO WHERE m.ID LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' GROUP BY m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM ORDER BY m.UNO

mapper.select: SELECT m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM, COALESCE(SUM(c.CAUTIONSCORE), 0) AS CAUCOUNT FROM SCOTT.MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CAUTION c ON m.UNO = c.UNO WHERE m.uno = #{uno} GROUP BY m.UNO, m.ID, m.PW, m.NAME, m.NICKNAME, m.GENDER, m.ADDRESS, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.BIRTHDAY, m.SOCIALNUM, m.SOCIALKEY, m.JOB, m.LEAVEREASON, m.LEAVEDATE, m.CK, m.DATEALARM ORDER BY m.UNO
